info.title: More recipes api documentation
info.description:
# Introduction
This apis perform CRUD for a recipe website called more recipes

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
The api's make use of Json web token to authenticate users

#status codes
* 401
* 404
* 400
* 500
* 200
* 201

# Rate limit
There is no limit to the number of request a user can make

post.description: This api endpoint add new recipes to the database
This api endpoint add review for recipes
This api endpoint sign up a new user
This api endpoint sign in an existing user

get.description: This api endpoint gets a single recipes from the database

put.description: This api endpoint should update recipes

post.description: This api endpoint add favorite for the recipe

get.description: This apie endpoint gets all the recipes in the database
This api endpoint gets the latest recipes in the database
This api endpoint gets the popular recipes in the database
This api endpoint  get recipes added by a user
This api endpoint should get all reviews for a recipe
This api endpoint should find all registered users
This api endpoint should get user favourite recipes

put.description: This api endpoint should update user profile

delete.description: This api endpoint should delete recipes

data.title: Plantain chicken
data.ingredients: 40 pcs unripe habanero peppers (atarodo, ose oyibo, atarugu) 2 green tatashe peppers or green bell peppers 1 locust bean seasoning (Iru, ogiri okpei or dawadawa) 20cl red palm oil (at least) 1 big onion 1 handful crayfish 850g assorted meat and fish. I used: Beef Shaki (cow tripe) Dry fish Stock fish

data.title: Cauliflower wrap
data.ingredients: 3 cauliflower florets 1 egg ½ red onion (sliced) Red bell pepper (chopped) Green bell pepper (chopped) Yellow bell pepper (chopped) 1 button mushroom (sliced) Salt (to taste) 3 strips bacon Mayonnaise (for serving) Carrot Oil (for frying)

data.title: Cake stew
data.ingredients: Assorted meat and fish. use a combination of the following: Beef Shaki (cow tripe) Smoked fish Dry fish Stock fish 20 cl palm oil 500g Efo Shoko 5 tatashe peppers 2 tablespoons ground crayfish 2 red onions 2 small stock cubes 2 tablespoons locust beans (iru) Salt & Habanero / Scotch Bonnet peppers (to taste)
